languages.text: "Поскольку нечестивец Адальберт оказался вероотступником, новый исповедник должен заново привести офицеров к присяге Богу-Императору. По традиции на церемонии присутствуют семьи офицеров, они и являются целью бунтовщика: он хочет разом вырезать элиту корабля. Я распорядилась устроить Немезиту ловушку — желаете ли вы принять личное участие в операции?"

"Since the impious Adalbert has turned out to be an apostate, it is the new confessor's duty to ensure that the officers retake their oath to the God-Emperor. Traditionally, the ceremony is attended by the officers' families, and it is they who are the target of the mutineer. He wishes to slaughter all of the ship's elite in one fell swoop. I have ordered a trap to be set for Nemesite. Would you like to be personally involved in the operation?"
languages.original_text: "Поскольку нечестивец Адальберт оказался вероотступником, новый исповедник должен заново привести офицеров к присяге Богу-Императору. По традиции на церемонии присутствуют семьи офицеров, они и являются целью бунтовщика: он хочет разом вырезать элиту корабля. Я распорядилась устроить Немезиту ловушку — желаете ли вы принять личное участие в операции?"

traits.locale_text: "Since the impious Adalbert has turned out to be an apostate, the new confessor must lead the officers to recommit themselves to the God-Emperor. Traditionally, the ceremony is attended by the officers' families, and it is they who are the target of the mutineer. He wishes to slaughter the ship's elite in one fell swoop. I have ordered a trap to be set for Nemesite, would you like to be personally involved in the operation?"

I have ordered a trap to be set for Nemesite, would you like to be personally involved in the operation?"

"Since the impious Adalbert has turned out to be an apostate, it is the new confessor's duty to ensure that the officers retake their oath to the God-Emperor. Traditionally, the ceremony is attended by the officers' families, and it is they who are the target of the mutineer. He wishes to slaughter all of the ship's elite in one fell swoop. I have ordered a trap to be set for Nemesite. Would you like to be personally involved in the operation?"

languages.text: "Seit der lästerliche Adalbert sich als Apostat entpuppt hat, ist es die Pflicht des neuen Konfessors, dafür zu sorgen, dass die Offiziere ihren Eid an den Gottimperator erneut ablegen. Traditionell nehmen an dieser Zeremonie die Familien der Offiziere teil, und sie sind auch das Ziel des Meuterers. Er will die gesamte Elite des Schiffs mit einem gewaltigen Streich ausmerzen. Ich habe befohlen, dass Nemesit eine Falle gestellt wird. Möchtet Ihr an dieser Operation persönlich teilnehmen?"
languages.original_text: "Since the impious Adalbert has turned out to be an apostate, it is the new confessor's duty to ensure that the officers retake their oath to the God-Emperor. Traditionally, the ceremony is attended by the officers' families, and it is they who are the target of the mutineer. He wishes to slaughter all of the ship's elite in one fell swoop. I have ordered a trap to be set for Nemesite. Would you like to be personally involved in the operation?"

traits.locale_text: "Seit der lästerliche Adalbert sich als Apostat entpuppt hat, ist es die Pflicht des neuen Konfessors, dafür zu sorgen, dass die Offiziere ihren Eid an den Gottimperator erneut ablegen. Traditionell nehmen an dieser Zeremonie die Familien der Offiziere teil, und sie sind auch das Ziel des Meuterers. Er will die gesamte Elite des Schiffs mit einem gewaltigen Streich ausmerzen. Ich habe befohlen, dass Nemesit eine Falle gestellt wird. Möchtet Ihr an dieser Operation persönlich teilnehmen?"

languages.text: «Dado que el impío Adalbert ha resultado ser un apóstata, el nuevo confesor tiene el deber de asegurarse de que los oficiales renueven su juramento al Dios Emperador. La tradición dicta que las familias de los oficiales asistan a la ceremonia, y precisamente ellos son los objetivos del amotinado. Pretende masacrar a la élite de la nave de un solo plumazo. He ordenado que se tienda una trampa a Nemesitio. ¿Le gustaría participar personalmente en la operación?».
languages.original_text: "Since the impious Adalbert has turned out to be an apostate, it is the new confessor's duty to ensure that the officers retake their oath to the God-Emperor. Traditionally, the ceremony is attended by the officers' families, and it is they who are the target of the mutineer. He wishes to slaughter all of the ship's elite in one fell swoop. I have ordered a trap to be set for Nemesite. Would you like to be personally involved in the operation?"

traits.locale_text: «Dado que el impío Adalbert ha resultado ser un apóstata, el nuevo confesor tiene el deber de asegurarse de que los oficiales renueven su juramento al Dios Emperador. La tradición dicta que las familias de los oficiales asistan a la ceremonia, y precisamente ellos son los objetivos del amotinado. Pretende masacrar a la élite de la nave de un solo plumazo. He ordenado que se tienda una trampa a Nemesitio. ¿Le gustaría participar personalmente en la operación?».

languages.text: 「信仰心に欠けるアダルバートが背教者であることが判明した今、士官たちが神である神帝陛下への誓いを再び立てるようにするのが、新しい聴罪師の務めです。伝統的として、この儀式には士官の家族も出席します。暴徒の標的になっている者達がね。奴は船内の精鋭を一度に皆殺しにすることを望んでいます。私はネメサイトに罠を仕掛けるよう命じました。あなたも個人的に作戦に参加したいですか？」
languages.original_text: "Since the impious Adalbert has turned out to be an apostate, it is the new confessor's duty to ensure that the officers retake their oath to the God-Emperor. Traditionally, the ceremony is attended by the officers' families, and it is they who are the target of the mutineer. He wishes to slaughter all of the ship's elite in one fell swoop. I have ordered a trap to be set for Nemesite. Would you like to be personally involved in the operation?"

traits.locale_text: 「信仰心に欠けるアダルバートが背教者であることが判明した今、士官たちが神である神帝陛下への誓いを再び立てるようにするのが、新しい聴罪師の務めです。伝統的として、この儀式には士官の家族も出席します。暴徒の標的になっている者達がね。奴は船内の精鋭を一度に皆殺しにすることを望んでいます。私はネメサイトに罠を仕掛けるよう命じました。あなたも個人的に作戦に参加したいですか？」

languages.text: “既然那个阿达伯特是个叛徒，那于情于理，新任告解神父都有责任为军官重新举行宣誓仪式，保障他们对神皇的忠诚。根据传统，军官和他们的家人都要参加仪式，而这些人正是那个叛乱分子的目标。他打算借着这个机会，一举屠戮船上的精英阶层。我已经下令为涅墨斯特设好了陷阱，您打算亲自参加这场行动吗？”
languages.original_text: "Since the impious Adalbert has turned out to be an apostate, it is the new confessor's duty to ensure that the officers retake their oath to the God-Emperor. Traditionally, the ceremony is attended by the officers' families, and it is they who are the target of the mutineer. He wishes to slaughter all of the ship's elite in one fell swoop. I have ordered a trap to be set for Nemesite. Would you like to be personally involved in the operation?"

traits.locale_text: “既然那个阿达伯特是个叛徒，那于情于理，新任告解神父都有责任为军官重新举行宣誓仪式，保障他们对神皇的忠诚。根据传统，军官和他们的家人都要参加仪式，而这些人正是那个叛乱分子的目标。他打算借着这个机会，一举屠戮船上的精英阶层。我已经下令为涅墨斯特设好了陷阱，您打算亲自参加这场行动吗？”

languages.text: « L'apostasie de ce mécréant d'Adalbert ayant éclaté au grand jour, le nouveau confesseur se doit de veiller à ce que les officiers renouvellent leur serment envers l'Empereur-Dieu. Or, la tradition veut que les familles des communiants assistent à la cérémonie, et ce sont elles que Némésite compte prendre pour cible. Son but est d'exterminer d'un même coup l'ensemble de l'élite du vaisseau. J'ai donc donné ordre de lui tendre un piège. Désirez-vous prendre part à l'opération ? »
languages.original_text: "Since the impious Adalbert has turned out to be an apostate, it is the new confessor's duty to ensure that the officers retake their oath to the God-Emperor. Traditionally, the ceremony is attended by the officers' families, and it is they who are the target of the mutineer. He wishes to slaughter all of the ship's elite in one fell swoop. I have ordered a trap to be set for Nemesite. Would you like to be personally involved in the operation?"
